panels.description:
All instances among pgsql cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page

value.title: PGSQL Instance for replication source instance ${__data.fields.SRC}
PGSQL Instance for replication destination instance ${__data.fields.DST}

panels.description: Leadership shows who is in charge of this cluster ${cls}
panels.title: Leadership

links.title: PGSQL Replication lag in bytes for Cluster ${cls}
PGSQL Replication Detail in seconds for Cluster ${cls}

panels.description: Rate of lsn in last minute
panels.title: LSN Progress Rate 1m

targets.expr: count by (ins)(pg_pubrel_count{ins="$primary"}) > bool 0 or on() vector(0)

panels.description: i = init , d = data sync , r = ready
panels.title: Subscription Table Count by State

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls
